extendedInfo.description: Too large files to download? Wanna your downloader much faster?Unsupported formats or failed download?Wanna a perfect solution?Here is your answer!Easy Downloader Pro is designed for you.Easy Downloader Pro is a professional, safe, stable and free downloader, effectively and quickly reducing all your downloading headache. It can not only enable you download large files in different formats easily, but also help you organize all the files in order.Highlights:a.	Professional. Multi-Protocol: HTTP, FTP supported, BT will be supported soon;. Multi-Browser: Stock browser, Dolphin browser, Sky fire, Boat Browser, Firefox, etc.b.	Effective. Multi-threading(multiple connections): Speedup the download by more than50%;. Multi-Task: Download different files simultaneously;. Pause/resume your downloads: Continue disconnected downloads;. Keep your downloads safe and unbroken on silly network breakages;c.	Easy. Category: All downloaded files are well organized in order;. File Manager: Easily manage all files in SD Card. Downloading Status: progress bar, downloaded notification. Copy/Paste links: Download tasks can be started by copying/pasting the link directly;. Share Link: Download task can be started by âshare Linkâ (long press then "Share Link" -> "Easy Downloader ")?	Whatâs new:  Easy Downloader Pro has realized a seamless integration with Dolphin browser.One of its perfect function is to be an add-on in Dolphin Browser: you can not only browse any files you want to download by Dolphin , but download them by Downloader Pro speedy and stably.Experience the brand new & speedy downloader, and it is designed for you!Key Words: download downloader all files professional easy file explorer file manager download all files music download fast download everythingmulti-threading speed dolphin browser
